shortDescription: Develop a responsive e-commerce website for a fashion brand. Must be proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and experience with WordPress is a plus.
Create an eye-catching landing page for a tech startup. Skills in HTML, CSS, and responsive design are required.
Build the server-side components for a social networking platform. Proficiency in Python and Django framework is a plus.
Customize and optimize a WordPress website for a blog. Knowledge of plugins and theme development is required.
Create a unique and memorable logo for a new tech startup. Originality and creativity are key.
Design a visually appealing brochure for a travel agency. Must convey the spirit of adventure and travel.
Design eye-catching web banners for an online advertising campaign. Creativity and attention to detail are important.
Create an attractive poster for a local event. Must capture the theme and spirit of the event.
Plan and execute a social media marketing campaign for a new product launch. Experience with Facebook and Instagram ads is a plus.
Create and manage an email marketing campaign for an e-commerce store. Knowledge of email marketing tools is required.
Optimize the website for search engines to improve organic traffic. Knowledge of SEO best practices is essential.
Set up and manage a pay-per-click advertising campaign for an online store. Experience with Google Ads is a plus.
